features.name: Game State Management
features.description: Centralized game state using Zustand with subscribeWithSelector middleware. Manages game board, selections, validation, scoring, and level progression across 5 levels with increasing difficulty.

features.name: Game Logic Engine
features.description: Core game mechanics including board generation with Fisher-Yates shuffle, letter/number placement (25-30% targets), selection validation, scoring calculation, and tile status determination.

features.name: Type System
features.description: Comprehensive TypeScript types for game state, config, validation results, game modes, stats, leaderboard, themes, and accessibility settings. Includes type guards and utility types.

features.name: Dashboard Container
features.description: Main rehabilitation program dashboard with two sections: Attention (implemented) and Memory (coming soon). Displays game mode cards with navigation.

features.name: Game Mode Cards
features.description: Interactive cards for selecting game modes (Selection and Count) with gradient styling, icons, and descriptions. Links to game routes.

features.name: Game Board
features.description: 15x15 interactive grid (225 tiles) for letter selection mode. Supports keyboard navigation, tile animations, selection limits, and accessibility features.

features.name: Game Tiles
features.description: Individual interactive tiles with letter display, selection states (selected/correct/wrong), animations, and keyboard support.

features.name: Game Board Container
features.description: Main game interface layout combining game board, target letters display, progress tracking, timer/score, and sidebar controls.

features.name: Target Letters Display
features.description: Shows the target letter(s) players need to find. Changes based on level (1-4 letters, level 5 uses numbers).

features.name: Game Progress
features.description: Visual progress indicator showing selected tiles vs total target tiles count.

features.name: Game Timer & Score
features.description: Real-time timer and score display with elapsed time tracking and final score calculation.

features.name: Game Sidebar Controls
features.description: Control panel with check answer button, reset game, pause/resume, and game state feedback messages.

features.name: Game Instructions
features.description: Mode-specific instruction cards displayed on dashboard explaining how to play each game mode.

features.name: Game Controls
features.description: Count mode input interface with number validation and submission for counting target letters.

features.name: Game Settings
features.description: Settings panel for configuring themes, sound, animations, accessibility options (reduced motion, high contrast, font size).

features.name: Game Instruction Panel
features.description: Modal/panel displaying detailed game instructions and help text.

features.name: Leaderboard
features.description: Top 10 scores display with player names, scores, times, and dates. Persists to localStorage.

features.name: Navigation
features.description: Top navigation bar with links to Dashboard, Game, Leaderboard, Settings, and Profile pages.

features.name: Dashboard Logic
features.description: Pure logic module defining dashboard configuration, game mode types, section layouts, and type guards for attention vs memory modes.

features.name: Sound Manager
features.description: Web Audio API-based sound effects for game events (tile select, win, lose, new game) with mute/unmute control.

features.name: Utility Functions
features.description: Helper utilities including class name merging with clsx and tailwind-merge.

features.name: UI Components
features.description: Reusable UI components: Button, Card, Input, Slider, Switch with consistent styling and accessibility.

features.name: Local Storage Persistence
features.description: Type-safe localStorage wrapper for persisting game stats, settings, and leaderboard data.

features.name: Game Pages
features.description: Dynamic routes for game modes (/game/selection, /game/count) with mode initialization and cleanup.

features.name: Settings Page
features.description: Dedicated settings page for configuring game preferences and accessibility options.

features.name: Profile Page
features.description: User profile page for viewing personal stats and achievements.

features.name: Root Layout
features.description: Application root layout with global styles, fonts, metadata, and navigation.

features.name: Home Redirect
features.description: Root route that redirects to dashboard for better UX.

features.name: Dashboard Page
features.description: Dashboard route rendering the main rehabilitation program interface.
